alert.note: Alert for Brevard; Orange; Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 29 at 4:45PM EDT until April 29 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Melbourne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Seminole County in east central Florida... Northwestern Brevard County in east central Florida... Southeastern Orange County in east central Florida... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 445 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wedgefield, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wedgefield, Christmas, Bithlo, Avalon Park and Chuluota. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for east central Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for east central Florida.
